text: Marclei Cesar Chaves Santos (born June 8, 1989), is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a striker. Currently plays for KKF Feronikeli in the Football Superleague of Kosovo.http://www.goal.com/vn/tintuc/the-cung-duong-clb-tphcm- lam-lieu-voi-loat-tan-binh/ud746amb6fy61p4j029cycyw2 ==Career== He started his professionally career in the Campeonato Brasileiro Série B in 2011 where he played for Boa. ===Mitra Kukar=== Previously, Marclei played for the Brazilian club side Bahia de Feira. His contract with the club actually only ends in May 2017. But because of the offer from Indonesian club side Mitra Kukar, he immediately ended his contract with Bahia de Feira as of 10 April 2017. ===Al- Salmiya SC=== On 2 February 2019, Marclei confirmed on his Instagram profile, that he had joined Al-Salmiya SC.Gagal di Thailand, Eks Striker Mitra Kukar Gabung Klub Kuwait, bolasport.com, 3 February 2019 ===KF Feronikeli=== After a brief return to Bahia de Feira, Marclei moved to Kosovan club KF Feronikeli in August 2020.Zyrtare: Feronikeli transferon sulmuesin brazilian, Marclei, telegrafi.com, 12 August 2020 ==Honours== ;Boa *Campeonato Mineiro 2 Winner: 2011 ;Mixto *Campeonato Mato-Grossense Runner-up: 2013 ;Ríver *Campeonato Piauiense Winner: 2014 ==References== ==External links== * *Marclei Santos at ZeroZero Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Votoraty Futebol Clube players Category:Santa Helena Esporte Clube players Category:G.D.
